title: Simulation-Based Cultural Competency Training Program for Nursing Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing practice experience and foundational knowledge of cultural diversity concepts
context.additional_context: A program for practicing nurses to systematically improve cultural care competencies. Conducts practice-centered learning by implementing real clinical cases via VR simulations

learning_goals: Analyze health beliefs of patients from diverse cultural backgrounds and develop nursing care plans reflecting cultural sensitivity
Apply nonverbal/verbal communication techniques considering cultural differences in actual simulation scenarios
Evaluate patient responses after implementing culture-related nursing interventions and derive improvement strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
